amendment.description: To strike section 402 and vest intelligence appropriations jurisdiction in the Select Committee on Intelligence.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3999 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 23 - 74. Record Vote Number: 200.

action.text: Amendment SA 3999 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3981. (consideration: CR S10632-10646; text: CR S10632) To strike section 402 and vest intelligence appropriations jurisdiction in the Select Committee on Intelligence.
